abstract: Olympic athletes and officials plead for silence as raucous Brazilian fans cheer for their country at inappropriate times during sporting events; some athletes were peeved over audience enthusiasm during table tennis matches, sport where crowds are typically small and quiet.
lead_paragraph: With their exuberance at several venues, fans of the Brazilian Olympians have surprised athletes and officials, especially in sports and at moments in which silence is valued.
snippet: With their exuberance at several venues, fans of the Brazilian Olympians have surprised athletes and officials, especially in sports and at moments in which silence is valued....

headline.main: And the Rio Crowd Goes Crazy! For Whatever!
headline.print_headline: And the Rio Crowd Goes Crazy! For Whatever!
